parameters.name: consumableResource
parameters.description: The name or ARN of the consumable resource to be updated.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Indicates how the quantity of the consumable resource will be updated. Must be one of: SET Sets the quantity of the resource to the value specified by the quantity parameter. ADD Increases the quantity of the resource by the value specified by the quantity parameter. REMOVE Reduces the quantity of the resource by the value specified by the quantity parameter.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: If this parameter is specified and two update requests with identical payloads and clientToken``s are received, these requests are considered the same request and the second request is rejected. A ``clientToken is valid for 8 hours or until one hour after the consumable resource is deleted, whichever is less. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: consumableResourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the consumable resource to be updated.

nested_items.name: consumableResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the consumable resource.

nested_items.name: totalQuantity
nested_items.description: The total amount of the consumable resource that is available.
